title: Land for sale in Katana
details:
This land suitable for live family looking in free environment & it's natural land. Electricity, telephone, water of well.
37 perch,
Located in Chanaka Laksiri Mawatha, Gamsaba handiya, 500m away from 251 route main road.
20min to Negombo town(10km)
Need sell soon contact us. If not answerd please leave a massage.
